author: Simon Difford
description: A splash of cachaça adds some Latin funk, lime adds a citrusy bite while a splash of fresh cream makes this Piña Colada creamy white.
name: Pina Colada (Difford's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
22.5 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with half scoop crushed ice and serve with paper straws
